meta.title: Nguyen Phuc Khang
meta.description: I am a fresh graduate engineer from International University, and I created this portfolio to showcase my work and document my journey as I continue to grow in the IT industry. My passion lies in applying best practices and continually improving my skills. What excites me most about programming is the problem-solving aspect; I thrive on overcoming challenges, which not only enhances my experience but also deepens my understanding.

name: Nguyen Phuc Khang
description: I am a fresh graduate engineer from International University, and I created this portfolio to showcase my work and document my journey as I continue to grow in the IT industry. My passion lies in applying best practices and continually improving my skills. What excites me most about programming is the problem-solving aspect; I thrive on overcoming challenges, which not only enhances my experience but also deepens my understanding.
about_description: My core technology stack includes ReactJS, NodeJS, and MySQL. I am also familiar with TypeScript, Python, and React Native. with a commitment to continuous learning and staying updated on emerging technologies. Currently, I am seeking a full-time position as a software developer. When I'm not coding, I enjoy gaming, driving, and exploring new areas of knowledge. At the moment, I am expanding my skill set by learning about QA/QC testing (Automation/Manual). Additionally, I have the capability to provide IT support service.

subtitle: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
GPA: 80.1/100

projects.title: IU Youth Union Mini App
projects.description: An application for the IU Youth Union, used together with their website to reach out to the community. This project applied the concept of web crawling using React libraries so that the aplication could be used together with the original website.
